typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		CHANNEL_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		TRANSACTION_DT as timestamp,
		FI_START_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_END_DATE as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_TERM_MATURITY as integer,
		FI_TERM_UOM as string,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE as string,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		FI_FLOOR_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BU_CODE as string,
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		TRANS_POINT_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE as string,
		CUST_RM_CODE as string,
		ACCT_RM_CODE as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS as string,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		BALANCE_EOP_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		BALANCE_EOP_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		INTEREST_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		INTEREST_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FiInstrStg
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		PF_SCENARIO_ID as string,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		SETID as string,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_YEAR as integer,
		ARCHIVE_FOR_PERIOD as integer,
		CPMS_SOURCE_DATA_DIR_PATH as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RunControlTbl
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		SOURCE_ID as string,
		DESCR as string,
		SEQ_NO as integer,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer,
		DESCRLONG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProcessInstanceTbl
ProcessInstanceTbl filter(PROCESS_INSTANCE == 20001) ~> Filter1
FiInstrStg, RunControlTbl join(FiInstrStg@ENTITY_ID == RunControlTbl@ENTITY_ID
	&& FiInstrStg@ASOF_DT == RunControlTbl@ASOF_DT
	&& FiInstrStg@CURRENCY_CD_FC == RunControlTbl@CURRENCY_CD_FC,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, Filter1 join(FiInstrStg@ENTITY_ID == ProcessInstanceTbl@ENTITY_ID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID = FiInstrStg@ENTITY_ID,
		FI_INSTRUMENT_ID,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		ASOF_DT = FiInstrStg@ASOF_DT,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID,
		BRANCH_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		CHANNEL_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT,
		PRODUCT,
		GL_CODE,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		TRANSACTION_DT,
		FI_START_DATE,
		FI_END_DATE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC = FiInstrStg@CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC,
		FI_TERM_MATURITY,
		FI_TERM_UOM,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE,
		FI_FLOOR_RATE,
		BU_CODE,
		TENOR_MONTHS,
		CLOSED_DATE,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE,
		REPRICING_FREQ,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE,
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE,
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE,
		LOAN_INDICATOR,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS,
		OPEN_DATE,
		MATURITY_DATE,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		FI_INTRUMENT_ID as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		ASOF_DT as timestamp,
		PF_SYSTEM_CODE as string,
		PF_SRC_SYSTEM_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		GL_CODE as string,
		TRANSACTION_DT as timestamp,
		FI_START_DATE as timestamp,
		FI_END_DATE as timestamp,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_TC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_BALANCE_AMT_FC as decimal(19,4),
		FI_TERM_MATURITY as integer,
		FI_TERM_UOM as string,
		RATE_RESET_TYPE as string,
		FI_INTEREST_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		FI_FLOOR_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		BU_CODE as string,
		TENOR_MONTHS as integer,
		CLOSED_DATE as timestamp,
		LAST_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		NEXT_REPRICING_DATE as timestamp,
		REPRICING_FREQ as integer,
		REG_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		HO_LOAN_GRADE as string,
		NPL_BORROWER_IND as string,
		BASE_RATE_TYPE as string,
		INTEREST_SPREAD_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		NON_STD_FTP_RATE as decimal(18,0),
		ACCT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		LOAN_INDICATOR as string,
		SUSPEND_INTEREST_IND as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		CUST_NAME_ENGLISH as string,
		BU_CODE_DERIVE as string,
		PRODUCT_SOURCE_ID as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_EOP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_AVE as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_INT as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_FTP as string,
		GL_ACCOUNT_OBS as string,
		OPEN_DATE as timestamp,
		MATURITY_DATE as timestamp,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
